en.FOOTER_FORM: Stay Up to Speed With NFT Market
en.BY_SUBSCRIBING: By subscribing, you agree to Ownity
en.MAIN-H2: Ownity is your one-stop NFT shop enabling fractionalization and co-ownership of any NFT listed for sale on OpenSea, LooksRare, X2Y2, and others.
en.FAQ-H2-1: Ownity enables would-be owners to split - fractionalize - NFTs, which otherwise can be too pricey, into a number of smaller parts - fractions - they can invest in as a group and manage as a DAO.
en.FAQ-H2-2: Also known as fractional NFT ownership, it is a new lower-barrier way to own that involves splitting up non-fungible tokens - collectibles, artworks, PFPs, photos & videos, gamified ones, membership passes, memorabilia, domain names, etc. - into smaller pieces to own them together.
en.FAQ-H2-3: Also referred to as fNFTs, they are whole NFTs divvied up into smaller pieces for ownership by a number of people. Fractionalized NFTs are designed to appeal to those wanting to participate in the booming NFT market without breaking the bank, or simply own non-fungible tokens with friends, family, or for business purposes.
en.FAQ-H1-4: Can I Fractionalize Any NFT with Ownity?
en.FAQ-H2-4: Ownity empowers its users to fractionalize any NFT from the supported collections listed for sale on OpenSea, LooksRare, X2Y2, and other marketplaces into chunks as small as 1% whatever the price. You can also buy the whole (100%) NFT with Ownity.
en.FAQ-H1-5: Can I Sell My NFT Fractions?
en.FAQ-H2-5: On Ownity, any fraction is sold as quickly as it is bought. You are free to handle NFT fractions you own with just a couple of clicks anytime.
en.FAQ-H1-6: What Are Benefits of NFT Co-Ownership?
en.FAQ-H2-6: First, co-ownership grants pricier NFTs greater affordability. Second, thanks to making NFTs more accessible, it boosts their liquidity. Third, co-ownership allows for fun cooperation between friends as well as other more formal undertakings based on joint ownership.
en.COOKIES-TITLE: We know you're fed up with this, but…
en.COOKIES-DESCRIBE-1: We use cookies to enhance your experience with Ownity, analyze our traffic, and for security and marketing. By visiting Ownity, you agree to our use of cookies.
en.COOKIES-DESCRIBE-2: We use cookies on our website to support technical features that enhance your user experience. We also collect anonymous analytical data, as described in Ownity Privacy Policy.
en.TOTAL_DESCRIBE: There's a small fee Ownity charges for transactions.
en.AMOUNT_CREDITED: The funds will be sent to the wallet you logged in with.
en.CONNECT_WALLET_SUBTITLE: Use one of the options to get started with Ownity and co-own your fave NFTs.
en.CONNECT_WALLET_P: Ownity doesn't store any sensitive data about your wallet. Your assets are safe at all times.
en.PRICE_CHANGED_DESCRIBE: The price of the NFT you're going to fractionalized has changed.
en.ITEM_UNTIL_CANCELLED: NFT is on sale until you cancel its listing or it's sold.
en.ITEM_UNTIL_VOTE: Your NFT will be listed if total owners accounting for at least 50% of its purchase price approve.
en.PRIVACY_POLICY_SECTION-1: Octogamex.com website administration is obliged to maintain your privacy on the Internet. We pay great attention to securing the data you provided to us. The purposes, for which we collect your personal data are:
en.PRIVACY_POLICY_SECTION-1-LIST_3: to communicate with visitors to this site, newsletters, online sales
en.PRIVACY_POLICY_SECTION-1-LIST_4: to present the information requested by the user
en.PRIVACY_POLICY_SECTION-1-LIST_5: to provide services associated with the website's specialization
en.PRIVACY_POLICY_SECTION-1-LIST_6: to provide the user with customer support
en.PRIVACY_POLICY_SECTION-1-LIST_7: to protect the security of our services, detect and prevent fraud, comply with legal requirements
en.PRIVACY_POLICY_SECTION-2-1: We collect and process your personal data only with your willing consent. With your permission, we can collect and process the following data:
en.PRIVACY_POLICY_SECTION-2-LIST_1: Identification information: name and surname, date of birth, e-mail address, phone number, home address, geolocation data
en.PRIVACY_POLICY_SECTION-2-LIST_2: Transaction information: public blockchain data, personal information published on the blockchain (digital wallet identifications, IP addresses)
en.PRIVACY_POLICY_SECTION-2-LIST_3: Financial information: bank card information, routing number, credit card number, debit card number
en.PRIVACY_POLICY_SECTION-2-LIST_4: Additional information: social media account information, personal photos, correspondence, data usage, device information.
en.PRIVACY_POLICY_SECTION-2-2: Collection and processing of your personal information is carried out in accordance with the laws of the European Union and the United Kingdom.
en.PRIVACY_POLICY_SECTION-3-1: The user, who has provided octogamex.com with their personal data, has the right for their alteration and removal, as well as the right to recall the agreement to data processing. Time, during which your personal data will be stored is: commercial and taxing data storage time. After finishing with the processing of your personal data, the website's administration will permanently delete it.
en.PRIVACY_POLICY_SECTION-3-2: To access your personal data, you can contact the administration at: support@octogamex.com. We will be able to pass your data to a third party only with your willing consent. If the data was transferred to a third party, which is not associated with our organization, we cannot perform any changes to that data.
